description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Classic Vector based arcade game. Power shields, Smart bombs, Extra lives.  In the 1980's games like this cost 25 cents per play and made millions, now they might make a few pennies.  If you are over the age of 30 you may have seen this game before and enjoy the nostalgia !!
